channel.title: [cod4] stand glitch
channel.description:
i dont know why it is called a stand glitch but here is what to do: 50cal - acog desert eagle bandolier stopping power steady aim
then snipe without scoping and 8/10 times it will kill instantly

item.title: [cod4] stand glitch
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:3, topic:187843”]Who the hell would think of that =\

Also there is another glitch where you have last stand perk on and you hold a flashbang when you go into last stand… the flashbang turns to a grenade and blows up almost immediatly[/quote]

Haha thats actually fun. You throw it at them as soon as you die, and it like explodes right away.

I was doing it for headquarters, because often times there are many people gathered in a single room/building. Ya you gotta sacrifice yourself, but I would often get up to 4 kills with it Still not very effective, just a funny glitch. And when you watch the kill cam, it seriously looks like I’m using a grenade launcher with my desert eagle

Read full topic
